name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: I've been to a POKEMON GYM a few times. But, I lost each time.

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: I noticed some POKEMANIACs prowling around.
I sold a useless NUGGET for 5000$!
I heard that GHOSTs haunt LAVENDER TOWN!

The element types of POKEMON make them stronger than some types 
and weaker than others!

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: Wow, are you a POKEMANIAC too? Want to see my collection?

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: I have more rare POKEMON at home!

name: Zapdos
Dialogue: Gyaoo!

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: POKEMON fight! Ready, go!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: Oh well, I'll get a ZUBAT as I go!

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: I draw POKEMON when I'm home.

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: I'm an artist, not a fighter.

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: I don't often come here, but I will fight you.

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: I like tiny POKEMON, big ones are too scary!

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: Do you now about costume players?

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: Costume players dress up as POKEMON for fun.

name: Trainer 7
Dialogue: My POKEMON techniques will leave you crying!

name: Trainer 7 after
Dialogue: In mountains, you'll often find rock-type POKEMON.

name: Trainer 8
Dialogue: Hit me with your best shot!

name: Trainer 8 after
Dialogue: I'll raise my POKEMON to beat yours, kid!

name: Trainer 9
Dialogue: This tunnel goes a long way, kid!

name: Trainer 9 after
Dialogue: Watch for ONIX! It can put the squeeze on you!

name: Trainer 10
Dialogue: Hmm. Maybe I'm lost in here...

name: Trainer 10 after
Dialogue: That sleeping POKEMON on Route 12 forced me to take this detour.

name: Trainer 11
Dialogue: Outsiders like you need to show me some respect!

name: Trainer 11 after
Dialogue: You're talented enough to hike!

name: Trainer 12
Dialogue: Hikers leave twigs as trail markers.

name: Trainer 12 after
Dialogue: I want to go home!

name: Trainer 13
Dialogue: Hahaha! Can you beat my power?

name: Trainer 13 after
Dialogue: I go for power because I hate thinking!

name: Trainer 14
Dialogue: You have a POKEDEX? I want one too!

name: Trainer 14 after
Dialogue: When you finish your POKEDEX, can I have it?

name: Trainer 15
Dialogue: Eek! Don't try anything funny in the dark!

name: Trainer 15 after
Dialogue: I saw a MACHOP in this tunnel!

name: Trainer 16
Dialogue: You have POKEMON! Let's start!

name: Trainer 16 after
Dialogue: Whew! I'm all sweaty now!

name: Trainer 17
Dialogue: I came this far for POKEMON!

name: Trainer 17 after
Dialogue: You looked cute and harmless!

name: Trainer 18
Dialogue: I'm feeling a bit faint from this tough hike.

name: Trainer 18 after
Dialogue:
The POKEMON here are so chunky! There should be a pink one 
with a floral pattern!

name: Trainer 19
Dialogue: Ha-hahah-ah-ha!

name: Trainer 19 after
Dialogue: Haha-ha-choo! Ha-choo! Snort! Snivel!

name: Trainer 20
Dialogue: Ah! This mountain air is delicious!

name: Trainer 20 after
Dialogue: I feel bloated on mountain air!

name: Trainer 21
Dialogue: Hi kid, want to see my POKEMON?

name: Trainer 21 after
Dialogue: I don't like you for beating me!
